content.rendered:
Case Studies

Explore the Results Achieved with Our Strategic PPC and SEO Management

Request A Proposal

PPC and SEO Case Studies

Using strategic digital marketing tactics, we were able to achieve the following results for our clients.

73%

Our PPC management services for a national clutch repair company resulted in a 73% savings in cost per conversion.

Read More

3,662%

Our SEO management services for a national insurance startup increased their organic website traffic by over 3,000%.

Read More

250%

Using our SEO and PPC services, a local storage company increased traffic by 250% and improved the bounce rate by over 50%.

Read More

46%

A client in the transportation software industry saw a 46% increase in leads with just one month of our PPC services.

Read More

71%

Using a combination of SEO and PPC services, a regional energy company saw a 71% increase in overall website traffic.

Read More

90%

Implementing a new responsive search ad feature helped a PPC client achieve a 90% reduction in cost per conversion.

Read More

57:1

Our PPC management services helped a university generate a 57:1 ROAS, or $57 returned for every $1 spent in Google Ads.

Read More

1,150%

Bid strategy and audience targeting adjustments helped increase a construction company’s online conversions by 1,150%.

Read More

65%

A/B testing, smart bidding, and offline conversion uploads helped improve a senior living company’s lead quality by 65% Y/Y.

Read More

Could your company benefit from expert PPC or SEO management?

Request a Proposal

Testimonials

Drew knows his stuff! He listens to our needs and gives honest recommendations. Excellent response time and attention to detail. Highly satisfied with their service.
Cynthia S.
15:13 24 Feb 21
Creative Website Marketing has brought so many innovative & measurable strategies to Atria. They are a valuable partner to our digital team. They are always the first to bring the most up to date technologies and tactics. They are extremely knowledgeable and responsive and great to work with. I would highly recommend them if you want to increase... your online visibility, qualified leads and ROI.read more
Jacqueline V.
22:29 01 Feb 21
I highly recommend Creative Website Marketing. This is a results driven group of professionals. My company appreciated the strategies they outlined and how they would bring people into our shop. Greatly appreciate their hard work.
Liz D.
20:32 14 Oct 20
We can not say enough good things about working with Debbie! Within a couple of months they have tweaked our adds and saving us $!
Natosha H.
18:37 13 Nov 20
We contracted with CREATIVE to help us promote our growing chain of self-storage facilities. They helped us improve our ranking on Google searches and implemented a comprehensive social media advertising campaign. When we developed a new website, they worked with our designer on SEO. The results have been outstanding. All relevant... statistics, including sales and revenues, are exceeding our best case projections. I would highly recommend Creative.read more
Bill H.
18:27 07 Oct 20
The Team is GREAT to work with! They are responsive, clear, and exceed expectations. They are experts in their field! I would highly recommend them! They will deliver to help you achieve your online goals!
Kelly B.
18:43 19 Feb 21
Thank you, Creative Website Marketing, for continually providing quality and value to our organization. CWM consists of a knowledgeable and professional team - they're always willing to explain and walk through any inquiries I may have. It's clear that they truly care about your business and helping you grow!
Marcie D.
16:25 12 Feb 21
Creative Website Marketing has a wonderful Team! They will become your Partner and they want to see your business succeed. They are professional, responsive and go the extra mile with their delivery. I would not even hesitate in referring them. They will work with you to meet your online goals.
Cathi M.
03:22 23 Feb 21
Creative Website Marketing has been awesome to work with regarding improving our website's SEO. They have a ton of tools they use to really prove their results. A lot of SEO companies claim they are getting results, but CWM actually has the numbers to back it up. They actually care about my business and seeing it succeed. I highly recommend using... them for all things advertising, SEO and website related!read more
Michael R.
20:44 15 Apr 21
The Creative Website Marketing team has worked with us several times and I've always been impressed with their depth of knowledge in all areas of digital marketing. With their impressive experience and skills, they improve your brand awareness in ways that generate good new leads. I would definitely recommend them, whether you're local or have... multiple locations.read more
Keith H.
18:11 05 Sep 17
Drew did a great job handling all of our SEO and analytics needs. Highly recommend and will definitely work with him again in the future.
Ellis L.
19:23 26 Apr 21
I have worked with the team at Creative Website Marketing on a few different projects, and it's THRILLING to see such fast, positive results! They are my go-to resource for search engine optimization and content marketing. Thank you, CWM team!
Christine F.
17:59 07 Oct 20
I worked with the Creative Website Marketing team with my previous employer and was thoroughly impressed with their work and contributions to our marketing efforts across ~200 locations in the US and Canada. They consistently over delivered and brought new ideas to the table. The CWM team navigated our complex data, helping us form actionable... strategies. Once strategies were implemented, CWM monitored performance and provided tools to help our team convey performance to our executives in concise/accurate reports. This hard work lead to increases across the board in our qualified leads rates, targeting, CTR, and other key KPIs.read more
Bryce C.
13:24 23 Apr 21
The team at Creative Website Marketing is a powerful business ally that possesses an enormous knowledge of digital marketing. On a daily basis it couples unsurpassed professionalism with many years of experience to generate demonstrable returns on inbound marketing strategy and tactics. Key to CWM's success is its ability to build lasting... relationships by working collaboratively with customers and partners.read more
Doug B.
14:58 05 Sep 17
A big thank you to Debbie and her team for the advice they have given me in redirecting our digital marketing efforts. The team at Creative Website Marketing has extensive experience with every size client and budget and are super helpful experts. Thank you!
Lisa H.
13:36 21 Oct 20
I've been working with Drew and CWM for close to a year now. Their model makes it extremely affordable for small businesses and sole proprietorships to trial their services. After a tremendous first few months, and a terrific working partnership, we decided to grow our campaign and make CWM a cornerstone of our marketing mix.Their smart,... talented, and professional staff helps us succeed in digital marketing. Whether you are a sole proprietor or have a full marketing staff, CWM can help make you better.read more
Evan B.
18:50 23 Mar 20

Let’s get started.
